author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Remove direct reference to CLHEP in all the algorithms - the last ones related to HCAL endocarps

#### PR validation:

Standard runTheMatrix.py works fine

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Meant for master and no back porting is needed
title: Run2-hcx195 Remove direct CLHEP reference in the algorithm for HCAL endcap
